name: NBT
description: NBT progressive web app with with React, Redux, server side rendering and code splitting

scripts.start: PLATFORM=mobile NODE_ENV=development SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.start:offlogger: PLATFORM=mobile NODE_ENV=development REDUX_LOGGER=false SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.start:desktop: PLATFORM=desktop NODE_ENV=development SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.start:desktop:offlogger: PLATFORM=desktop NODE_ENV=development REDUX_LOGGER=false SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.startwin: set PLATFORM=mobile&& set PLUS=false&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set SITE=nbt&& npm run serve
scripts.startwin:plus: set PLATFORM=mobile&& set PLUS=true&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set SITE=nbt&& npm run serve
scripts.startwin:plusdesktop: set PLATFORM=desktop&& set PLUS=true&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set SITE=nbt&& npm run serve
scripts.startwin:desktop: set PLATFORM=desktop&& set NODE_ENV=development&& set SITE=nbt&& npm run serve

scripts.start:plusdesktop: PLATFORM=desktop PLUS=true NODE_ENV=development SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.prod:build: PLATFORM=mobile SITE=nbt SITE_PATH='' ASSET_PATH=https://static.nbt.indiatimes.com/ ASSET_PATH_PLUS=https://static.nbt.indiatimes.com/clientPlus NODE_ENV=production npm run build

scripts.prod:serve: WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=false SITE_PATH='' NODE_ENV=production SITE=nbt ASSET_PATH=https://static.nbt.indiatimes.com/ PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.prodserve: WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=false NODE_ENV=production SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.proddev:build: PLATFORM=mobile WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=true NODE_ENV=production SITE=nbt npm run build
scripts.proddev:serve: PLATFORM=mobile WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=true NODE_ENV=production SITE=nbt PORT=3001 npm run serve
scripts.proddev:win:build: set PLATFORM=mobile&& set SITE=nbt&& set SITE_PATH=&& set ASSET_PATH=/&& set WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=true&& set NODE_ENV=production&& npm run build
scripts.proddev:win:serve: set PLATFORM=mobile&& set SITE=nbt&& set SITE_PATH=&& set ASSET_PATH=/&& set WEBPACK_DEV_SERVER=true&& set NODE_ENV=production&& npm run serve
